description: Obtained by reading first numerator then denominator of fractions in full Stern-Brocot tree (A007305/A047679).
comments: When presented in this way, every row (e.g. row 3, 1 3 2 3 3 2 3 1) is a palindrome. - _Joshua Zucker_, May 11 2006
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 08 2000
